name: Space Gems (Samuel54tw)
description:
You have to collect 20 green gems before the timer reaches 0. Avoid the purple gem or you'll lose the game.

Works with Gamepad!

It's my first game so If you find a bug or you have a suggestion, tell me in the comments.

Special thanks to G.F.S for the music and D113 for some of the sprites.

*Working in the v1.1

Pd: G.F.S is going to upload the OST to Spotify
